alert.note: Alert for Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 12:57PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A GUSTY SHOWER WILL IMPACT LYCOMING...TIOGA AND NORTHEASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 200 PM EDT... At 1256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower along a line extending from 14 miles southwest of Corning to Lock Haven. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Lock Haven, Jersey Shore, Mansfield, Wellsboro, Morris, Elkland, Blossburg, Avis, Dunnstown, Duboistown, McElhattan, Lawrenceville, Covington, Arnot, Millerton, Waterville, Leonard Harrison State Park, Ralston and Cedar Run. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming; Tioga
